```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(spotifyr)
```

```{r}
disney <- get_playlist_audio_features("","37i9dQZF1DX8C9xQcOrE6T")
```

```{r}
s80 <- get_playlist_audio_features("", "23xQYspGsaIsztrKTHM8cN")
s00 <- get_playlist_audio_features("", "6dv5FbNRVlQelteqnNDFTe")
```

```{r}
digster <-
  bind_rows(
    s80 %>% mutate(category = "s80"),
    s00 %>% mutate(category = "s00")
  )
digster %>% ggplot(aes(x = danceability)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.1)

```
